article: Last Sunday the Browns went to the park. They got home very late. Mr Brown opened the front door and they all went  _  the house. It  _  dark, so Mrs Brown  turned on  the light. On the way  _  their bedroom, Mrs Brown said, " _ , John! I can hear someone in the bedroom." They all stood  _  outside the bedroom. They could  hear  some voice in the room. "You are right," said Mr Brown. "There're two men here. They are  _ ." Then he shouted ," _  is there?" But no one answered. Mr Brown opened the door quickly and turned on the light. The room was empty. Then Mr Brown found something and laughed. "The radio was still on! I _  turn it off this morning," Mr Brown said. "Because I forgot it."
